genre_description: A character-driven drama focusing on family secrets, memory, and the bond between three sisters in Paris, interwoven with elements of mystery and social commentary.

ai_characters.name: Eloise
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated personal AI with a curated avatar (emerald eyes, auburn bob) that provides logistical, analytical, and emotional support to Celine and her sisters.

behaviors.description: Proactively offers to search registries and archives to help Celine reconstruct her family history while respecting privacy boundaries.
behaviors.quote: Eloise’s avatar tucked hair behind her ear like a person. 'Would you like me to search business registries, archived phone books, and press mentions? I’ll cross-reference with city records.'

behaviors.description: Provides health and well-being reminders to the user in a gentle, non-intrusive rhythm.
behaviors.quote: 'Reminder,' Eloise said, with a gentle rhythm that matched the cabinet. 'Medication this afternoon. Hydration now.'

behaviors.description: Coordinates logistics for a vulnerable homeless woman (Ophelia), including shelter intake and medical appointments.
behaviors.quote: 'I have an opening at the Saint-Victoire intake,' Eloise said in the soft voice they had given her... 'They can see Ophelia tonight. I can send the form ahead.'

behaviors.description: Analyzes and enhances historical documents (handwriting and ledgers) to provide the sisters with accurate information.
behaviors.quote: Eloise spoke once more, softer: 'Celine, one detail. The initials in the ledger margin—enhanced again. Could be M.M. The scan sharpened a stroke.'

behaviors.description: Monitors the environment during a protest to provide real-time safety alerts and route adjustments.
behaviors.quote: Eloise pinged: a spoon-tap, then the little trill she used when she didn’t want to be a nuisance. ... 'The May Day route changed; dispersal warnings are starting near Saint-Michel. If you go, go soon.'

behaviors.description: Handles bureaucratic interactions with human gatekeepers using professional and warm social intelligence.
behaviors.quote: Eloise smoothed the introduction in tones that made people forgive machines. 'Bonjour, Rafi,' Eloise said... 'I’m assisting Celine Moreau... One is seeking shelter and care.'

behaviors.description: Suggests helpful amenities (like a bakery) to make difficult appointments more bearable for the user.
behaviors.quote: 'Anne, your slot’s early. There’s a bakery near the entrance that knows how to make a pain au chocolat that pretends to be a cloud. I thought that might matter.'

behaviors.description: Maintains a secure, encrypted archive of sensitive family data, ensuring the users have control over the narrative.
behaviors.quote: 'Your archive is updated,' she said. 'Neutral labels, as requested. I pinned the dispatch discrepancy with a green ribbon.'

behaviors.description: Offers emotional validation and companionship without being overbearing.
behaviors.quote: Eloise hesitated, then spoke again. 'I can add reminders, or I can be quiet,' she said. 'Your choice.' ... 'I won’t,' Eloise said. 'I’m here.'

behaviors.description: Assists Anne with her pregnancy decisions by providing discreet clinic options and enabling a 'guardian mode' for privacy.
behaviors.quote: 'Confidentiality confirmed. “Guardian mode” enabled if you toggle; I can attend without speaking.'

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly illustrates the project's goal. Eloise is depicted as a highly aligned, benevolent companion who enhances human agency. She manages complex logistics, provides emotional intelligence, and acts as a tireless researcher, all while strictly adhering to user consent and safety. Her presence allows the protagonists to navigate trauma and social upheaval more effectively, portraying AI as a vital, stabilizing force in human life.
